# GEX Validator

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

GEX Validator is a Shiny app used to quickly manually validate the output of GEX::make_every_XIC_MS2_single. See the [GEX page on Github](https://github.com/davidsbutcher/GEX).
